"God would have all who profess to be gospel medical missionaries learn diligently the lessons of the Great Teacher. . . 


                              -440- 

The one book that is essential for all to study is the Bible. (778) Studied with reverence, and Godly Fear, it is the greatest of all educators. . . In our medical schools and institutions we need men who have a deeper knowledge of the Scriptures. . . Because the Word of God has been neglected, strange things have been done in the medical missionary work of late. The Lord cannot accept the present showing."
